pageContext.claim: “We've started the wall billion six last year billion six this year, we're moving it rapidly in San Diego and other parts of the country, we're picking the locations that are worse, oh by the way it works so easily it works.”
pageContext.analysis: The Republican mayor of San Diego has said, "We already have a safe and secure border in San Diego built by the federal government." The city council passed a resolution opposing the border wall. The wall was not "started" last year and it's not clear where the funding Trump is referencing is coming from. Congress hasn't allocated these funds.
